metadata.title: MINI-REVIEW Inhibitors of virus replication: recent developments and prospects

abstract.original_text: The search for inhibitors of viral replication is dependent on understanding the events taking place at the molecular level during viral infection. All the essential steps during the viral life cycle are potential targets for antiviral drugs. Classical inhibitors of herpesvirus replication cause chain termination during viral DNA replication.
